seoDescription: Международная Олимпиада по Блокчейну (IBCOL) - это многопрофильный конкурс по разработке и дизайну программных решений на основе технологии блокчейн. IBCOL 2019 приглашает студентов со всего мира решать реальные задачи с помощью децентрализованных приложений.
subhead: Спонсоры и сторонники 2019 Международной олимпиады Blockchain

sponsors.name: Кардано
sponsors.description: Cardano is a decentralised public blockchain and cryptocurrency project and is fully open sourced. Cardano is developing a smart contract platform which seeks to deliver more advanced features than any protocol previously developed. Cardano is represented by Emurgo HK.

sponsors.name: EmurgoHK
sponsors.description: EMURGO HK is the venture builder for the Cardano blockchain protocol. And now we're in Hong Kong. Located in one of the world's most dynamic business hubs, and perfectly positioned between Northeast and Southeast Asia, EmurgoHK is spreading the revolutionary Cardano protocol across the Pacific Rim.

sponsors.name: Емали
sponsors.description: Emali is an enterprise blockchain developer working on applications in the Fin/Insur/RegTech sectors specializing on identity management, trade and supply chain finance, insurance claim management, fraud detection and regulatory registries.

sponsors.name: CredProof
sponsors.description: CredProof is an identity proofing and credential verification service for academic, employment, and other instances where trusted authentication is required between trustless parties in a private and secure manner in accordance to the EU GDPR.

sponsors.name: R3
sponsors.description: R3 is an enterprise blockchain software firm working with a broad ecosystem of more than 300 members and partners across multiple industries from both the private and public sectors to develop on open-source blockchain platform Corda.

supportingOrganisations.name: Гонконгское блокчейн сообщество (HKBCS)
supportingOrganisations.description: The Hong Kong Blockchain Society promotes sustainable and mature of the blockchain ecosystem. HKBCS encourages and supports projects that are legal and compliant in Hong Kong and the surrounding region.

supportingOrganisations.name: Blockchain Education Network (BEN)
supportingOrganisations.description: Blockchain Education Network is made up of students and alumni across the world who are creating bitcoin and blockchain clubs on their academic campuses. By exploring this socioeconomic experiment within the safety of their peers, students build new expectations and innovations.

supportingOrganisations.name: Hong Kong Science Park (HKSTP)
supportingOrganisations.description: Hong Kong Science Park is dedicated to building a vibrant innovation and technology ecosystem to connect stakeholders, nurture technology talents, facilitate collaboration, and catalyse innovations to deliver social and economic benefits to Hong Kong and the region.

supportingOrganisations.name: Городской университет Гонконга (CityU)
supportingOrganisations.description: The College of Business at City University of Hong Kong strives to nurture all-rounded graduates who are competent professionals, tech-savvy, critical thinkers and life-long learners. We offer state-of-the-art learning, cutting-edge research and innovative teaching facilities to prepare students for the challenges opening up in the world.

supportingOrganisations.name: Университет Уотерлу (UW)
supportingOrganisations.description: The University of Waterloo’s Hong Kong Foundation was opened in 2011 to strengthen ties with the Asian community, leveraging Hong Kong’s geographic advantage and the unique East-meets-West cultural mix as part of the UW's strategic plan to establish a strong presence in the region. UWHKF is located in Central, Hong Kong's business district.

supportingOrganisations.name: National Taiwan University, D-School
supportingOrganisations.description: Stanley Wang D-School @ NTU was established in 2014 and officially launched courses in the fall of 2015. The mission of D-School is to promote innovation and cooperation between NTU students and faculty from all departments. D-School also addresses important social issues with innovative solutions and enable hands- on realization to enhance the overall competitiveness of Taiwan.

supportingOrganisations.name: University of Waterloo, Faculty of Engineering
supportingOrganisations.description: Waterloo Engineering at the University of Waterloo is Canada’s largest engineering school and a pipeline for top engineering talent to the world’s leading companies. Ranked among the top 50 engineering schools in the world, our reputation for excellence is built on the foundation of co-op education and a bold history of innovation.

supportingOrganisations.name: UW Blockchain Club
supportingOrganisations.description: A student-run organization at the University of Waterloo focusing on everything related to blockchain and cryptocurrency. Established in May 2018, UW Blockchain aims to create a community of Blockchain enthusiasts in UW, by immersing them into an engaging set of workshops, hackathons, networking events etc.

supportingOrganisations.name: Blockchain Slovakia
supportingOrganisations.description: Blockchain Slovakia is a non-profit organization focused on education and awareness in the area of cryptocurrencies and blockchain technologies. We create a platform for discussion between developers, companies, academia, regulators as well as the public interested in these technologies.

supportingOrganisations.name: bitfwd
supportingOrganisations.description: bitfwd is a grassroots community of cypherpunks, Blockchain developers, entrepreneurs, and crypto enthusiasts. We bring together resources, content and educational activities. Let's bootstrap the cryptoeconomy.

supportingOrganisations.name: Chinese University of Hong Kong, Engineering Alumni Association
supportingOrganisations.description: The Chinese University of Hong Kong Engineering Alumni Association (ERGAA) is the official alumni association eligible for all graduates of Engineering Faculty of the Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK).

supportingOrganisations.name: Future Pre-employment Planning (Shenzhen)
supportingOrganisations.description: FPP empowers students to discover their true passion and career interest and equip them with professional competencies, so they can ultimately pursue a personally-rewarding career and make a positive impact on society, by offering online and offline individualized solutions that fill the gap between theoretical classroom learning and practical skillsets needed in the employment market.

supportingOrganisations.name: Московский государственный университет (МГУ), Юридический факультет
supportingOrganisations.description: Юридический факультет МГУ - ведущее учебное заведение в России готовящее специалистов в сфере права. Школа объединяет в своей работе классическую академическую культуру и новейшие требования рынка труда. По этой причине девиз школы - «Традиции и развитие». На факультете учатся около 3000 учеников и аспирантов.

prompt: Если Ваша организация заинтересована в поддержке Международной Blockchain Олимпиады, пожалуйста, свяжитесь с sponsors@ibcol.org
